reviews.comment: Amazing space for our grand opening promotion! The foot traffic was exactly what we needed, and Sarah was incredibly helpful with the installation process. Would definitely book again.
Perfect location for our gym membership drive. Great visibility and the owner was very accommodating with our schedule.
Good experience overall. The space was exactly as described and we saw a noticeable increase in walk-in customers during our campaign.
Exceeded our expectations! Sarah was professional and made the entire booking process seamless. The window display brought us great results.
Solid experience. Quick response times and the location had steady foot traffic. Will consider for future campaigns.
Outstanding! This was our first time using the platform and Sarah made it so easy. The ad placement was perfect for our target audience.
